name: Dragon Poacher
description:
Trailer | Vimeo Mirror

Official Page: etkworks.com/dragonpoacher

Sure nature and animals are all pretty and dandy on one hand. On the other, you can get a handful of gold for each scale you can get off the hide of a dragon. And the babies are so much easier to kill. It's a no-brainer really. Time to kill some dragons.

__________________________________________

An highscore arcade style game where you drive the local juvenile fauna to extinction for large piles of money. Made by a three man team in 24 hours.

http://etkworks.com/

http://etkworks.itch.io/

@etkworks
